text: @RandPaul Didn’t you have #COVID19 Mr Paul? Didn’t you get it at a charity event with over 100 people present? Kinda sounds like what could happen at a church! Over 100 hundred people breathing on each other for over an hour! It’s not about punishing people for being Christian
